parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.75</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Arrays </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Changes the element at the given (zero-based) index of the [[Array|array]].<br>
If the index is out of bounds, the array will [[resize]] to incorporate the index as its last value, padding with [[nil]] as necessary. See [[set#Examples| Example 4]]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> array '''set''' [index, value] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> array: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [index, value]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> value: [[Anything]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_arrayOne [[set]] [0, "Hello"];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Append "Bye" as last element to <tt>_arrayTwo</tt>:<br>
<code>_arrayTwo [[set]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[count]] _arrayTwo, "Bye"];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Replace the last element of <tt>_arrayThree</tt> with 23:<br>
<code>_arrayThree [[set]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>([[count]] _arrayThree) - 1, 23];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x4 </name>=<value> Using [[set]] with an index that is out of bounds:<br>
<code>_array = ["A"];
_array [[set]] [2, "C"]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>_array is now ["A", [[nil]], "C"]</value></part></template>
_array [[set]] [1, "B"]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>_array is now ["A", "B", "C"]</value></part></template>
</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE4</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Array]], [[plus a]], [[valuea plus valueb]], [[a - b]], [[resize]], [[reverse]], [[select]], [[in]], [[find]], [[findIf]], [[toArray]], [[toString]], [[forEach]], [[count]], [[pushBack]], [[pushBackUnique]], [[apply]], [[deleteAt]], [[deleteRange]], [[append]], [[sort]], [[param]], [[params]], [[arrayIntersect]], [[splitString]], [[joinString]]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
